price: 角笛に一吹き、吹き込まれ、¹
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ
footnotes: １　これは、一回目の吹き込みのこと（前掲書、同頁参照）。家畜章７３の訳注も参照。

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri nafkhatun wāḥidatun
